xwikidoc.title: XWikiSyntaxNewLineLineBreaks
xwikidoc.content:
= Editing =
== New Line/Line Breaks ==
=== 1.0 New Line Line Breaks ===
A new line is a carriage return. A line break is a forced new line that can appear anywhere in the text.
{{info}} New lines are not honored in XWiki Syntax 1.0. Use line breaks instead. {{/info}}
|=Feature|=XWiki Syntax 1.0|=Result |Line break|{{{Line\\New line}}}|Line\\New line |New line|Line\\New line|Line New line
=== 2.0 New Line Line Breaks ===
A new line is a carriage return. A line break is a forced new line that can appear anywhere in the text.
|=Feature|=XWiki Syntax {{velocity}}$crtSyntaxVer{{/velocity}}|=Result |Line break|{{{Line\\New line}}}|Line\\New line |New line|Line\\New line|Line\\New line
